description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the elevation of privilege vulnerability in the Windows DWM core library (CVE-2024-30051):

1. Download and apply the required updates for your specific Windows version from the official update catalog.
2. Restart your system after the installation to ensure all changes are effective.

**Details**:
- The following KB articles address this vulnerability:
  - KB5037788 for Windows 10 and 32-bit Systems.
  - KB5037770 for Windows 11 Version 21H2.
  - KB5037768 for Windows 10 Version 21H2 and 22H2.
  - KB5037771 for Windows 11 Version 23H2 and 22H2.
- Access the update packages here:
  - [KB5037788](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037788)
  - [KB5037771](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037771)
  - [KB5037770](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037770)
  - [KB5037768](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037768)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is up-to-date with the latest updates prior to applying new patches.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the installation of any updates.
